wikipedia_page.main: Greig Denham (born 5 October 1976) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a defender.

response: He was had various spells coaching at Junior level since ending his playing career, with the first of his managerial stints at Camelon Juniors in July 2009, succeeding Greig Denham. A short spell as boss of Arthurlie followed in 2016.
